about_the_game:
"Through the gates of hell, dost thou find thy self worthy of the Harambe."

The highly anticipated DLC add-on to the critically acclaimed Cynoclept: The Game, Harambe Jump acts as a scarefest to knock your socks off! Play as Tyrone as he fights his way through the scariest world imaginable, Harambe-land, to secure his spot in the Harambe Olympic Games!

Features:
  • Even more horrifying jumpscares
  • Even better artificial intelligence
  • Better horror
  • True skill






  • The coolest kid on the block, Tyrone is known throughout the world for his running skills! To test his endurance and strength, he wants to participate in the Harambe Olympics! But to do that, he must first navigate the pits of hell and annihilate the 360 noscopers before it is too late!



  • The god of this realm, Harambe acts as the overseer into the Harambe Olympics! He watches to find any and all worthy participants to welcome them into his world of Harambe-land!

name: Cynoclept: The Game - Harambe Jump

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3225 @ 3.30GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Disk space requirement may change over time.
